name: Taha Scrambled Eggs
steps: Taha cracks eggs into a large bowl;Babak whisks eggs with salt and pepper until fluffy;Parisa heats butter in a non-stick pan over medium heat;Paria pours eggs into pan and stirs gently;Artin serves the creamy scrambled eggs on a warm plate

name: Babak Omelet
steps: Babak beats eggs in a mixing bowl until smooth;Parisa dices fresh tomato into small cubes;Paria grates cheese and adds to the egg mixture;Artin pours mixture into hot pan and cooks until edges set;Amirreza folds omelet in half and serves golden brown

name: Parisa Egg Sandwich
steps: Parisa toasts bread slices until crispy golden;Paria fries egg sunny-side up with a pinch of salt;Artin spreads butter on warm toast;Amirreza assembles sandwich with egg between bread;Mahdis cuts sandwich diagonally and serves

name: Paria Chicken Soup
steps: Paria washes and cuts chicken into pieces;Artin peels and dices carrots and potatoes;Amirreza boils chicken in large pot with vegetables;Mahdis seasons with salt and pepper to taste;Mahdi simmers for 45 minutes until tender and serves hot

name: Artin Chicken Pilaf
steps: Artin rinses rice until water runs clear;Amirreza sautes chicken pieces in butter until golden;Mahdis adds rice and stirs to coat with butter;Mahdi pours in water and brings to boil;Elahe covers and cooks on low heat until rice is fluffy

name: Amirreza Beef Stew
steps: Amirreza cuts beef into bite-sized cubes;Mahdis browns beef in hot oil until seared;Mahdi adds diced potatoes carrots and tomatoes;Elahe seasons with salt and covers pot;Amirali simmers stew for two hours until meat is tender

name: Mahdis Fruit Salad
steps: Mahdis washes and cores fresh apples;Mahdi peels and slices ripe bananas;Elahe tears lettuce into bite-sized pieces;Amirali tosses all fruits together in large bowl;Kosar drizzles with honey and serves chilled

name: Mahdi Grilled Cheese
steps: Mahdi spreads butter on outside of bread slices;Elahe places cheese between two bread slices;Amirali heats pan over medium-low heat;Kosar grills sandwich until golden and cheese melts;Erfan flips carefully and serves hot

name: Elahe Fried Rice
steps: Elahe cooks rice and lets it cool completely;Amirali dices carrots and onions finely;Kosar scrambles eggs in hot oil and sets aside;Erfan stir-fries vegetables until tender;Amirhossein combines rice eggs and vegetables and seasons

name: Amirali Pancakes
steps: Amirali sifts flour into large mixing bowl;Kosar whisks eggs milk and sugar together;Erfan combines wet and dry ingredients until smooth;Amirhossein melts butter on hot griddle;Koorosh pours batter and flips pancakes when bubbles form
